name: Unrest Indigo
description: The idea that all feelings have a single definition is about to change. Unrest Indigo is a first person game of the horror genre that explores the dark depths of a great change.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: intel core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: geforce gtx 950 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 12 GB available space Sound Card: realtek high definition audio
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: intel core i7 Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: geforce gtx 1050 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 12 GB available space Sound Card: realtek high definition audio
